channel.title: Right bank emote again
channel.description:
i am tired of posting this topic over and over again no one helps if ya do ya te best help me how to fix bank emote button
:) :) :) :) :cool:

item.title: Right bank emote again
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

first

search for

update()

then
do enter and add

sendFrame126("@whi@Bank", 178); //bank

now the 178 is youre emote button id !
important i d k the full list off idâ€™s

ok
now search

				                            case 162: //think emote

you should see whole thing
delete it till

                                                                        [code]   case 164: //[/code]

and add

[code]                            case 162: //bank emote
			if(emotes == 0)
			{
				if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) 
 {
 sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy.");
 }
 else
{
	openUpBank();
}
			}
			else
			{
				emotes = 0;
				pEmote = playerSE;
				updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
			break;
			        [/code]
